title._content: [Private Albert H. Davis of Company K, 6th New Hampshire Infantry Regiment in uniform, shoulder scales, and Hardee hat with Model 1841 Mississippi rifle, sword bayonet, knapsack with bedroll, canteen, and haversack] (LOC)

description._content: [Private Albert H. Davis of Company K, 6th New Hampshire Infantry Regiment in uniform, shoulder scales, and Hardee hat with Model 1841 Mississippi rifle, sword bayonet, knapsack with bedroll, canteen, and haversack] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype ; 12 x 9.3 cm Notes: Title devised by Library staff from information in collections file. Case: Leather oval geometric. Additional information in collections file. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: Gunsight Antiques, Standish, Maine, 2008. Subjects: Davis, Albert H.,--d. 1861. United States.--Army--New Hampshire Infantry Regiment, 6th (1861-1865)--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1870-1880. Military uniforms--Union--1870-1880. Rifles--1870-1880. Bayonets--1870-1880. Canteens--1870-1880. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Equipment & supplies--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.26462 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2080
